message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $11,000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to accept $9,500 for the product? I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make $11,500 to be comfortable. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
